page.title: 15BUNNING AND SONS
page.content: Bunning and Sons operates on the site of the village forge in Gressenhall where our parents used to watch horses being shod. It was founded in1906 by Robert Bunning, grandfather of the 3 brothers who currently run the firm . The shoeing side of the business was sold in 1969, and the business expanded into agricultural engineering doing various repairs. Now with a work force of 20 the firm manufactures trailers which are sold throughout East Anglia, Kent and Sussex. Our fathers, Robin and John are two of the brothers and David is the other one. Our grandfather George Bunning lost an eye when a spark flew into it when he was shoeing a horse. Our cousin James also goes to St.Mary's C.P.School. By Caroline and Suzanne - aged 10.
